attributes.action: Stop the ridiculous perk where the taxpayer purchases second homes for MP's
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Refurbish empty Tower blocks to provide identicle single bedroom appartments for MP's. If they want lavish second homes they have always the option to purchase them for themselves.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
